Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel (part of 55104), interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of a black-painted hieratic text, now very smudged in places.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393091) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393091)
